search.query: |loadjob savedsearch="roconnor:search:Index Frequency" | fields index frequency Percentile

| tstats count WHERE index=$index$ earliest=$field1.earliest$ latest=$field1.latest$ by _time host sourcetype index span=15m | eval combo=host."-".sourcetype."-".index | fields combo _ time host sourcetype index count

| tstats count WHERE index=$index$ earliest=$field1.earliest$ latest=$field1.latest$ by _time host sourcetype index span=15m | sort 0 - host sourcetype index _time | streamstats window=2 range(_time) as range by host sourcetype index | sort - host | search range > 900 | stats avg(range) as avg max(range) as max by sourcetype host index | eval max=round(max/60,0) | eval avg=round(avg/60,0) | rename max as "Maximum Gap" avg as "Average Gap"

| tstats count WHERE index=$index$ earliest=$field1.earliest$ latest=$field1.latest$ by _time host sourcetype index span=15m | sort 0 - host sourcetype index _time | streamstats window=2 range(_time) as range by host sourcetype index | eval HourOfDay=strftime(_time, "%H") | eval DayOfWeek=strftime(_time, "%A") | eval weekend=case(LIKE(DayOfWeek,"Saturday"), "weekend", LIKE(DayOfWeek,"Sunday"), "weekend", 1=1, "weekday") | eval business_hour=case(HourOfDay>8 AND HourOfDay<17 AND weekend!="weekend", "businesshour", 1=1, "nonbusinesshour") | fields business_hour weekend sourcetype index host count
|eventcount summarize=false index=* -count | table index | dedup index

panel.html: This Dashboard displays advanced information about the shape of your data - broken down by a specific index.

Panel Descriptions
Latest Event Exactly what it sounds like. What time did the last event come in for this index?
Maximum Data Gap (By Index) What was the maximum time between any two events in the selected time period? If no results were found, this means data has been sending at least once every 15 minutes.
Average Data Gap (By Index) What was the average time between any two events in the selected time period? If no results were found, this means data has been sending at least once every 15 minutes.
Percent Difference (This Week vs. Last Week) What is the percent difference in events between this week, and last week? If we had 100 events this week, and 200 events last week, than our percent difference would be -66.6%
Timechart of Data A visualization of the number of events being sent over the selected time period.
Analysis by Host/Index/Sourcetype An advanced look at each Host/Sourcetype/Index combination for the selected sourcetype. This panel is clickable if you want to navigate over to an analysis of that host or sourcetype.
Business Hour vs Non-Business Hour Senders This panel will show you if your selected index sends more data during typical business hours, or during non-business hours.
Weekend vs Weekday Senders This panel will show you if your selected index sends more data during the weekend or weekdays.

search.query: | stats last(_time) as last by index | eval c_time=strftime(last,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | fields c_time

panel.title: Percent Difference (This Week vs. Last Week)

search.query: | tstats count WHERE index="$index$" AND (index=* OR index=_*) earliest=-14d latest=now by _time index span=7d | fields _time index count | streamstats current=f last(count) as last_count by index | eval diff = count-last_count | sort - _time | head 1 | eval percent_diff=((count-last_count)/((count+last_count)/2))*100 | fields percent_diff
| xyseries _time combo count | makecontinuous _time span=15m | fillnull value=0

panel.title: Specific Gap Broken Down by Host/Index/Sourcetype

search.query: | sort 0 - host sourcetype index _time | streamstats window=2 range(_time) as range by host sourcetype index | eval combo=host."-".sourcetype."-".index | stats avg(range) as avg max(range) as max count(combo) as M by sourcetype host index| eval max=round(max,0) | eval avg=round(avg,0) | addinfo | eval N=ceiling((info_max_time-info_min_time)/15/60) | eval frequency=M/N | fields index sourcetype host frequency avg max| eval frequency=round(frequency*100,0)."%"

panel.title: Business Hour vs Non-Business Hour Senders

search.query: | eval combo=host."&&&&".sourcetype."&&&&".index | stats avg(count) as avg by business_hour,combo | xyseries combo business_hour avg |fillnull value=0 | eval perc_diff=abs(((businesshour-nonbusinesshour)/((businesshour+nonbusinesshour)/2))*100) | fillnull value=0 perc_diff | eval perc_diff=round(perc_diff,0)."%" | rex field=combo "(?<host>(.*))&&&&(?<sourcetype>(.*))&&&&(?<index>(.*))" | sort 0 - perc_diff | fields host index sourcetype perc_diff businesshour nonbusinesshour | rename perc_diff as "Percent Difference" businesshour as "Average Events(Business Hours)" nonbusinesshour as "Average Events(Non-Business Hours)"

| eval combo=host."&&&&".sourcetype."&&&&".index | stats avg(count) as avg by weekend,combo | xyseries combo weekend avg |fillnull value=0 | eval perc_diff=abs(((weekday-weekend)/((weekday+weekend)/2))*100) | fillnull value=0 perc_diff | eval perc_diff=round(perc_diff,0)."%" | rex field=combo "(?<host>(.*))&&&&(?<sourcetype>(.*))&&&&(?<index>(.*))" | sort 0 - perc_diff | fields host index sourcetype perc_diff weekday weekend | rename perc_diff as "Percent Difference" combo as "host-sourcetype-index" weekday as "Average Events (Weekday)" weekend as "Average Events (Weekend)"
